title: Enchanting Pink Petal Chandbali Earrings
materials: Base metal with Gold finish. Features meticulously set Pink Stones and White American Diamonds.
features: Classic Chandbali design, reminiscent of Mughal-inspired Indian Jewelry. The earring showcases a cascade of pink stone petals and glittering AD stones, set in a graceful, tiered structure. Delicate filigree work connecting each petal and the floral tops add an intricate touch, echoing traditional craftsmanship.
colors: and White. The combination of the gold finish with the pink and white creates a feminine and opulent look
perfectly complementing traditional South Indian attire.
occasions: festive celebrations like Sankranthi or Diwali
and special occasions such as engagement parties or any event where a touch of traditional elegance is desired. Also suitable for modern evening wear when you want to make a statement.
description: These Chandbali earrings offer a blend of traditional Mughal and South Indian aesthetics, adding a touch of regal charm to your look. The design is carefully crafted for optimal shine and brilliance, making them a dazzling addition to any jewelry collection. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, they are designed for lasting beauty and enjoyment.
